item.title: About me
item.author: Author
item.description: Hi, my name is Patrick Fischer. I’m a swiss software engineer focusing on skipping the bullshit advisory and try to keep it simple. I wrote my first lines of code in BASIC with the age of 12. Today it would qualify as a poor Chatbot about my childhood heroes ðŸ˜. Until my study I visited the digitals realm from time to time. Sidenode at least one site is still up and running with the layout of the early days of the internet.
